name: Frog Fashion
description:
A dress-up game for Frog Jam, made in around 24 hours.

Customise and dress a frog.

Code, music, and some art by Jox. Other art by Jox's mysterious sibling. 

The background music can be downloaded or listened to here on my SoundCloud.

Font by Alfredo Marco Pradil, from here.

Built in Ren'Py VN Engine.
